Class WindNeedle

java.lang.Object

org.jfree.chart.needle.WindNeedle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WindNeedle
extends ArrowNeedle
implements Serializable
A needle that indicates wind direction, for use with the CompassPlot class.
